name: SFTranscription
desc: A textual representation of the given speech it its entirety, as recognized by the speech recognizer.

items.name: var formattedString: String
items.desc: The entire transcription of utterances, formatted into a single, user-displayable string.

items.name: var segments: [SFTranscriptionSegment]
items.desc: An array of transcription segments that represent the parts of the transcription, as identified by the speech recognizer.
